description.@value: Organisation that organises operationally the data ecosystem and ensures its diffusion and commercialisation.

definitions: Defines the services and data needed
Defines precise governance rules and business model
Define the value of the ecosystem
responsibilitiesAndObligations: MUST define the precise governance rules
MUST define the Code of conduct
MUST define how other participants can be involved in code of conduct / accession rules definition (democratic or centralised governance)
MUST ensure the respect of rules set by the Alliance Structure
MUST make the rules and values of the data ecosystem publicly available in machine readable format
